If  I am correct in my thinking, the woman will walk one step to the left
and one step behind her samurai so that if the need arises she will not be
injured by the sword as it drawn ... ???  Maybe, this is just my silly idea,
but this has always been my thinking as to why this is so.  Peace and love
... tsukiyo
